finishing slay.name: Finishing Slay
finishing slay.desc: If you land a critical attack while also having stacks from the Chain of Perfection talent, consume all those for a massive damaging attack. This works on other players as well.

vital wound.name: Vital Wound
vital wound.desc: Uppercutting your opponent punctures their lungs, slowing their rate of posture recovery for 10 seconds.

bloodthirsty.name: Bloodthirsty
bloodthirsty.desc: Recover health on hit. When landing a critical, deal 30 bleed damage over 5 seconds.

punishing riposte.name: Punishing Riposte
punishing riposte.desc: When parrying a guardbreak, enhance your critical for the next 4 seconds. If you land your crit on your opponent's block while it is enhanced, immediately guardbreak your opponent.

bulwark breaker.name: Bulwark Breaker
bulwark breaker.desc: Increase the size of your Pressure Blast, with the last hit of it dealing increased posture damage.

belief.name: Belief
belief.desc: Your medium weapon mantras now deal extra damage based on how much Willpower you have.

sovereign's counter.name: Sovereign's Counter
sovereign's counter.desc: Improve the efficiency of every counter you use. This effect becomes stronger for Punishment if you have the Riot Breaker talent.

swift strike.name: Swift Strike
swift strike.desc: Hitting your opponent's back with an M1 will enhance your nextc ritical, turning into a teleport backstab that procs all assassination Talents. Doesn't go away until you cast your critical. 20s CD.

expeditious combo.name: Expeditious Combo
expeditious combo.desc: Landing an uppercut will grant you a buff to your Onslaught for 15 seconds, using Onslaught during this time will massively increase the speed of it.

cruel counter.name: Cruel Counter
cruel counter.desc: When using your initial charge up critical on your Krulian Knife, if you interrupt someone's attack with it apply Cruel Counter on them, massively increasing the damage they take from your critical attacks.

blitz.name: Blitz
blitz.desc: Increase how quick you release your Prominence Draw.

assassin's strike.name: Assassin's Strike
assassin's strike.desc: Your Rapid Slashes now deals twice the amount of damage.

curved edge.name: Curved Edge
curved edge.desc: Your light weapon mantras now gain 30% more chip.

rosen's technique.name: Rosen's Technique
rosen's technique.desc: If you use Tactical Reload, Rosen's Peacemaker has 30 seconds less off its cooldown.

battle frenzy.name: Battle Frenzy
battle frenzy.desc: The grip on your weapon tightens, reduce the posture of all mantras you block with this effect scaling with the number of combat tags you have on your character.
